text: When I was a kid there still was double decker bus in which u can open the window
One of a rare instance where a pirate taxi was spotted
Before all of it was phased out
My mother always scolded me for doing so
Cuz it would cause all the bugs to fly in
Any of you taken a pirate taxi before?
i think we to young liao
